prompt_base: beautiful precocious 8-year-old girl, yellow humanoid skin, spiky 8-point hairstyle, 8k realistic photo, school lighting, intelligent serene expression
feature_prompt: delicate skin texture, detailed 8-point hair texture, subtle reflections, realistic fabric texture, bright pearl necklace texture, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, smooth skin, perfect teeth, large round doll eyes, low quality, makeup, blurry hair, (human:1.2)
